title: utf8_test.go: few insignificant typos in tests
body:
Perfectionist in me doesn't sleep well.

https://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/src/pkg/unicode/utf8/utf8_test.go#167

Line 167, DecodeRune is called (twice) instead of DecodeRuneInString as following error
message says.

https://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/src/pkg/unicode/utf8/utf8_test.go#185

Same problem, but reversed. DecodeRuneInString is called and described as DecodeRune in
following error message.

P.S. Don't ask how and why I've found these. :D
